__comment: The beginning of Journey to The Far Lands! I'm going to start naming this 'jevent_1' instead of 'event_18' because that was getting confusing. August 7th, 2021.

description.text: Journey to The Far Lands I - August 7th, 2021
After the discovery of an ancient ritual site, a band of adventurers pledges to travel to the distant Far Lands, the mythical "End of the World".
